events.message: The applicant submitted a personal loan application to cover medical expenses related to recent treatments.
The loan application was categorised under Personal Loan due to the stated medical expense purpose.
A loan officer was assigned to manage the application and assist the applicant with further steps.
The initial review was conducted to verify the completeness and eligibility of the personal loan application.
The applicant was asked to submit medical bills, proof of income, and identification documents for further processing.
All requested documents including medical bills, pay slips, and identity proof were submitted by the applicant.
A credit check was completed showing a stable credit history with minor debts already under good management.
Risk assessment concluded the applicant has a moderate risk profile considering current debts and income.
A loan offer with competitive interest rates and repayment terms was presented to the applicant for review.
The applicant responded positively with questions about repayment flexibility and expressed intent to accept.
The application was escalated to senior management for approval given the loan amount requested exceeds standard limits.
Senior management approved the personal loan, confirming the terms and conditions described earlier.
The loan amount was successfully transferred to the applicant's bank account as per the agreement.
A follow-up was made to ensure the applicant is satisfied with the loan process and offered assistance with repayments.
The loan application was closed successfully after confirming the applicant has received all documentation and support.
